questions.question:
What is the output of the following program?

class Base {
public:
    virtual void print() {
        cout << "Base ";
    }
};

class Derived : public Base {
public:
    void print() override {
        cout << "Derived ";
    }
};

int main() {
    Base obj;
    Base* ptr = &obj;
    ptr->print();
    return 0;
}

What is the value of "x" after the execution of the following code?

int x = 5;
int& ref = x;
ref++;

What is the output of the following code?

class Base {
public:
    Base() {
        cout << "Base ";
    }
};

class Derived : public Base {
public:
    Derived() {
        cout << "Derived ";
    }
};

int main() {
    Derived d;
    return 0;
}

What is the output of the following program?

int x = 5;
do {
    cout << x << " ";
} while (--x);

What will be the output of the following code?

int x = 5;
while (x > 0) {
    cout << x << " ";
    x -= 2;
}

What is the output of the following code?

class A {
public:
    virtual void display() {
        cout << "A";
    }
};

class B : public A {
public:
    void display() override {
        cout << "B";
    }
};

int main() {
    B b;
    A* aptr = &b;
    aptr->display();
    return 0;
}

What will be the value of "x" after the execution of the following code?

int x = 5;
int* ptr = &x;
( *ptr ) *= 2;

What is the output of the following program?

int x = 10;
do {
    cout << x << " ";
} while (x-- > 0);

What is the value of "x" after the execution of the following code?

int x = 7;
int y = 4;
int* ptr = &x;
x = (*ptr) + y;

What is the output of the following code?

class A {
public:
    virtual void display() {
        cout << "A";
    }
};

class B : public A {
public:
    void display() override {
        cout << "B";
    }
};

int main() {
    B* bptr = new B;
    A* aptr = bptr;
    aptr->display();
    return 0;
}

What will be the value of "x" after the execution of the following code?

int x = 5;
int& ref = x;
ref = 3;

What is the output of the following program?

int x = 10;
do {
    cout << x;
} while (x--);

What is the value of "x" after the execution of the following code?

int x = 5;
int* ptr = &x;
x = *ptr + 2;

What is the output of the following code?

class Base {
public:
    virtual void print() {
        cout << "Base";
    }
};

class Derived : public Base {
public:
    void print() override {
        cout << "Derived";
    }
};

int main() {
    Base* ptr = new Derived;
    Derived* dptr = dynamic_cast(ptr);
dptr->print();
    return 0;
}

What is the output of the following program?

int x = 1;
for (int i = 1; i <= 5; i++) {
    if (i == 3) {
        continue;
    }
    cout << i << " ";
}
return 0;

What will be the output of the following code?

int x = 5;
while (x > 0) {
    cout << x << " ";
    x /= 2;
}

What is the output of the following program?

int x = 3;
do {
    cout << x;
} while (x--);

What will be the value of "x" after the execution of the following code?

int x = 5;
int* ptr = &x;
( *ptr )++;

What is the output of the following program?

int x = 5;
do {
    cout << x << " ";
} while (x++);

What is the value of "x" after the execution of the following code?

int x = 3;
int y = 2;
int* ptr = &x;
x = y + (*ptr);
